headline: Charles Schwab Named One of the 50 Most Community-Minded Companies in the U.S. for Ninth Consecutive Year
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, June 04, 2025--Charles Schwab is named a Civic 50 honoree for the ninth consecutive year by Points of Light.
